title: r/Entitledparents Karen Breaks Into My Property To Use My Pool!
description:
r/Entitledparents OP has a swimming pool on his property, so of course the new Karen on the block shows up at OP's front door with her kids, and they're all wearing swimming suits. They believe that they're entitled to use OP's swimming pool whenever they want. OP turns them down and tells them that there's a community swimming pool just a few hours away. Naturally, the entitled Karen then breaks onto OP's property to use his pool without his permission! If you like this podcast and want to see more, follow my podcast for more daily Reddit content!
